org.eclipse.golo.compiler

Class GoloCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.golo.compiler.GoloCompiler

  • public final class GoloCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
    The Golo compiler.

    Instances of this class may be reused to compile several sources.

    Several methods are made public while they do not necessarily need so for the needs of the Golo compiler. Such deviations from a "good and clean" design are on-purpose, as this facilitates the implementation of Golo support in IDEs.

    • Method Detail

      • setExceptionBuilder

        public void setExceptionBuilder(GoloCompilationException.Builder builder)
        Initializes an ExceptionBuilder to collect errors instead of throwing immediately. This method is made public for the requirements of IDEs support.
        Parameters:
        builder - the exception builder to add problems into.

      • resetExceptionBuilder

        public void resetExceptionBuilder()

      • initParser

        public GoloParser initParser(java.io.Reader sourceReader)
        Initializes a parser from a reader. This method is made public for the requirements of IDEs support.
        Parameters:
        sourceReader - the source code reader.
        Returns:
        the parser.

      • compile

        public java.util.List<CodeGenerationResult> compile(java.lang.String goloSourceFilename,
                                                    java.io.Reader sourceCode)
                                             throws GoloCompilationException
        Compiles a Golo source file from an input stream, and returns a collection of results.
        Parameters:
        goloSourceFilename - the source file name.
        sourceCode - the source code reader.
        Returns:
        a list of compilation results.
        Throws:
        GoloCompilationException - if a problem occurs during any phase of the compilation work.

      • parse

        public ASTCompilationUnit parse(java.lang.String goloSourceFilename,
                                GoloParser parser)
                         throws GoloCompilationException
        Produces a parse tree for a Golo source file. This is mostly useful to IDEs.
        Parameters:
        goloSourceFilename - the source file name.
        parser - the parser to use.
        Returns:
        the resulting parse tree.
        Throws:
        GoloCompilationException - if the parser encounters an error.

                                java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        GoloCompilationException
        java.io.IOException

      • check

        public GoloModule check(ASTCompilationUnit compilationUnit)
        Checks that the source code is minimally sound by converting a parse tree to an intermediate representation, and running a few classic visitors over it. This is mostly useful to IDEs.
        Parameters:
        compilationUnit - the source parse tree.
        Returns:
        the intermediate representation of the source.
        Throws:
        GoloCompilationException - if an error exists in the source represented by the input parse tree.
